template.name: Restaurant Reservations For The Travel Trade
Restaurant Reservations For The Travel Trade

html.t-att-data-website-id: website.id if editable and website else None

head.script:
(function(){ var widget_id = 'pb2QApjqan';var d=document;var w=window;function l(){
var s = document.createElement('script'); s.type = 'text/javascript'; s.async = true; s.src = '//code.jivosite.com/script/widget/'+widget_id; var ss = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s, ss);}if(d.readyState=='complete'){l();}else{if(w.attachEvent){w.attachEvent('onload',l);}else{w.addEventListener('load',l,false);}}})();

t.t-if: main_object and 'website_meta_title' in main_object and not title
main_object and 'name' in main_object and not title and not additional_title

meta.name: description
meta.t-att-content: main_object and 'website_meta_description' in main_object and main_object.website_meta_description or website_meta_description

meta.name: keywords
meta.t-att-content: main_object and 'website_meta_keywords' in main_object and main_object.website_meta_keywords or website_meta_keywords

head.title: Book a Menu - Your restaurant reservation specialist

input.t-att-value: user.partner_id.wbsite_color or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.wbsite_color or ''
user.partner_id.submenu_color or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.submenu_color or ''
user.partner_id.header_color or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.header_color or ''
user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website or ''

a.t-att-href: '/capital_centric/restaurant/bookings' if user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.partner_type == 'venue' or user.partner_id.partner_type == 'venue' else '/'

div.h3: Keep in touch, Join our newsletter

div.p: Book A Menu, 48 Warwick Street, Soho, London - W1B 5AW
Copyright © 2014 Season & Vine Ltd. All Rights Reserved. This site is compatible with IE Version (9.0 & above), Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome browsers.

input.t-att-value: user.partner_id.wbsite_color or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.wbsite_color or ''
input.name: wbsite_color

input.t-att-value: user.partner_id.submenu_color or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.submenu_color or ''
input.name: submenu_color

input.t-att-value: user.partner_id.header_color or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.header_color or ''
input.name: header_color

input.t-att-value: user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website or ''
input.name: font_website

input.t-att-value: user.partner_id.wbsite_color or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.wbsite_color or ''
user.partner_id.submenu_color or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.submenu_color or ''
user.partner_id.header_color or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.header_color or ''

option.t-att-selected: 'selected' if (user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website) == 'Oswald' else None
'selected' if (user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website) == 'PT Serif' else None
'selected' if (user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website) == 'Gudea' else None
'selected' if (user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website) == 'Amaranth' else None
'selected' if (user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website) == 'Lusitana' else None
'selected' if (user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website) == 'Dancing Script' else None
'selected' if (user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website) == 'Voltaire' else None
'selected' if (user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website) == 'Marvel' else None
'selected' if (user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website) == 'Lobster Two' else None
'selected' if (user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website) == 'Rajdhani' else None
'selected' if (user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website) == 'Old Standard TT' else None
'selected' if (user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website) == 'Bubblegum Sans' else None
'selected' if (user.partner_id.font_website or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.font_website) == 'Handlee' else None

t.t-esc: user.partner_id.about_us or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.about_us or ''
user.partner_id.privacy_policy or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.privacy_policy or ''

input.t-attf-class: form-control operator_inputs #{error and 'name' in error and 'has-error' or ''}
input.name: name
input.title: Enter the name of the company

input.t-attf-class: form-control operator_inputs #{error and 'contact_name' in error and 'has-error' or ''}
input.name: contact_name
input.title: Enter the name of the customer

input.t-attf-class: form-control operator_inputs #{error and 'email' in error and 'has-error' or ''}
input.name: email
input.title: Enter the email address of the company

input.t-attf-class: form-control operator_inputs #{error and 'password' in error and 'has-error' or ''}
input.name: password
input.title: Enter a password

input.name: phone
input.title: Enter the phone number of the company

input.name: mobile
